short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A casual cookie clicker game where you gather cookies by clicking cookies. The more you click, the greater your cookie empire.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of clicking? Buy upgrades that will make cookies for you! Buy as many items from the shop as you can to increase your cookie production!

Features:
- Play offline (no internet needed)
- Easy controls
- Automated cookie production
- Prestige to increase the amount of cookies you can click
- Unlimited cookies

Updates:

Added backup option so you can save your record across multiple devices
